results.title: Role of simvastatin and RORa activity in the macrophage apoptotic pathway
results.text_hl: This study was conducted to explore the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @GENE_RORA @GENE_6095 @@@retinoic acid receptor-related orphan receptor alpha@@@ (@GENE_RORA @GENE_6095 @@@RORa@@@) ligands on apoptosis in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Monocytic_Acute</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007948 @@@acute monocytic leukemia@@@ (@CELLLINE_CVCL:0006 @@@THP-1@@@) macrophage cells.
